mapper.select: select count(*) from flinkInfo a where (a.flink_name like #{pattern} or a.flink_url like #{pattern} or a.describe like #{pattern} or a.put_time like #{pattern}) and a.delete_state=0
select * from flinkInfo where flink_id=#{pattern} and delete_state=0

select top ${maxSize} * from (select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by put_time desc)as rownumber,* from flinkInfo where delete_state=0) as a where rownumber>#{firstResult} and (a.flink_name like #{pattern} or a.flink_url like #{pattern} or a.describe like #{pattern} or a.put_time like #{pattern})
